text: قل انى لا املك لكم ضرا ولا رشدا

translations.translation: Say: "Neither is your loss within my power nor bringing you to guidance."
Say: “Surely neither it is in my power to hurt you nor to bring you to the Right Way.”
Say, "I do not possess any power to harm or benefit you".
Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I am not the master of any harm or benefit for you.”
Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to the right path."
Say: I do not control for you evil or good.
Say: 'Surely I possess no power over you, either for hurt or for rectitude.'
Say: Lo! I control not hurt nor benefit for you.
Say, "It is not in my power to cause you either harm or good?"
Say thou: 'verily own not for you power of hurt nor of benefit
Say, ‘I have no power to bring you any harm or good [of my own accord].’
Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to right conduct."
Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to the Right Path."
Say: 'Indeed, I possess no power over you, either for harm or for guidance'
Say, “It is not in my power to harm you, nor to bring you to right conduct.”
Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
[72:21] Say: ‘I truly have no power to bring you any harm, to lead [you] astray, or any guidance’, any good.
Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Lo! I control not hurt) I cannot drive away from you harm, forsakenness or chastisement (nor benefit for you) nor can I give you benefit and guidance.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
فإن قالوا: هل لك أن تشاركنا معك في عبادتك وخضوعك؟ { قُلْ } لهم يا أكمل الرسل: { إِنِّي لاَ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ } من تلقاء نفسي { ضَرّاً } يضركم به ويعذبكم إن أردت إضراركم وتعذيبكم { وَلاَ رَشَداً } [الجن: 21] يرشدكم به ويهديكم إن أردت هدياتكم ورشادكم، بل لا أملك لنفسي ضراً ولا نفعاً، فكيف لكم؟! بل ما



[الأنعام: 50] والأمر بيد الله العليم الحكيم
